title: Symlinks are deleted on 0.14.14 upgrade

labels.name: bug
labels.description: A problem with current functionality, as opposed to missing functionality (enhancement)

body:
Updated Syncthing on both my desktop and server - both Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit - this morning, and it appears that it doesn't like the new symlink patch. Things appear to be syncing, but the log is absolutely stuffed with:

```
[PW634] 16:06:23 INFO: Puller (folder "Music", dir "music"): incompatible symlink entry; rescan with newer Syncthing on source
[PW634] 16:06:23 INFO: Puller (folder "Music", dir "music"): incompatible symlink entry; rescan with newer Syncthing on source
[PW634] 16:06:23 INFO: Puller (folder "Music", dir "music"): incompatible symlink entry; rescan with newer Syncthing on source
[PW634] 16:06:23 INFO: Puller (folder "Music", dir "music"): incompatible symlink entry; rescan with newer Syncthing on source
[PW634] 16:06:23 INFO: Puller (folder "Music", dir "music"): incompatible symlink entry; rescan with newer Syncthing on source
[PW634] 16:06:23 INFO: Puller (folder "Music", dir "music"): incompatible symlink entry; rescan with newer Syncthing on source
[PW634] 16:06:23 INFO: Puller (folder "Music", dir "music"): incompatible symlink entry; rescan with newer Syncthing on source
[PW634] 16:06:23 INFO: Puller (folder "Music", dir "music"): incompatible symlink entry; rescan with newer Syncthing on source
[PW634] 16:06:23 INFO: Puller (folder "Music", dir "music"): incompatible symlink entry; rescan with newer Syncthing on source
[PW634] 16:06:23 INFO: Puller (folder "Music", dir "music"): incompatible symlink entry; rescan with newer Syncthing on source
[PW634] 16:06:23 INFO: Puller (folder "Music", dir "music"): incompatible symlink entry; rescan with newer Syncthing on source
[PW634] 16:06:23 INFO: Folder "Music" isn't making progress. Pausing puller for 1m0s.
```

After the minute pause, another batch of errors appears. Oddly, the directory in question - which is itself a symlink to another directory called "My Music" in the same parent directory, for historical reasons - appears to be syncing OK in both directions.

The error indicates that it's running into the "symlinks can't be synced between 0.14.14 and older versions" problem, *except* that both devices are running 0.14.14 just fine. The errors only appear on the desktop client; the server shows nothing strange in the logs.

### Version Information
Syncthing Version: v0.14.14
OS Version: Ubuntu 14.04 64-Bit
